#Plotting the data

merged_plots <- create_combined_graph() + plot_layout(axes = "collect", guides = "collect") & 
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0.1,0.1,0.1,0.1), "cm"), 
        axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 15))
